title: The Ant in the Photograph
description: Have you ever worked hard on something that you wanted to share with others, and then suddenly your hard work was destroyed? In The Ant in the Photograph, Daron creates an elaborate sculpture but may not be able to share it with his father. This story can be used to teach students how to retell to better understand and describe the elements of a story.
meta: admired, camera, concentrate, conversation, photograph, recycled, ruined, sculpture
Story Elements : Identify characters, setting, and plot
Prepositional Phrases : Understand and use prepositional phrases
Compound Words : recognize and understand compound words in a text

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
